channel.title: life on Joy Chen
channel.description: Recent content in life on Joy Chen

item.title: How I learned to ride a bike
item.description: First attempt # When I was 8, my parents tried to teach me to ride a bike. I started with training wheels. One day, I fell off my bike (with training wheels), and the wound took a month to heal. I never rode that bike again. Second attempt # My freshman year of college, my friends and I were walking around campus at midnight. Specifcially, we were in between the Physical Sciences Building and Klarman Hall.
